mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT sfbadocno AS WORKORDER_NO, SFBA006 AS ITEM_CODE, IMAAL003 AS ITEM_NAME, IMAAL004 AS ITEM_SPEC, sfba014 AS UNIT_OF_MEASURE, sfba023 AS QUANTITY, sfbaseq as SEQUENCE FROM DSDATA.SFBA_T A LEFT JOIN DSDATA.IMAA_T B ON A.SFBA006 = B.IMAA001 AND SFBAENT = IMAAENT LEFT JOIN DSDATA.IMAAL_T C ON A.SFBA006 = C.IMAAl001 AND SFBAENT = IMAALENT WHERE A.SFBAENT = #{erpCode} AND A.SFBASITE = 'AM01' AND IMAAL002 = 'zh_CN'

SELECT DISTINCT sfbadocno AS WORKORDER_NO, SFBA006 AS ITEM_CODE, IMAAL003 AS ITEM_NAME, IMAAL004 AS ITEM_SPEC, sfba014 AS UNIT_OF_MEASURE, sfba023 AS QUANTITY, sfbaseq as SEQUENCE FROM DSDATA.SFBA_T A LEFT JOIN DSDATA.IMAA_T B ON A.SFBA006 = B.IMAA001 AND SFBAENT = IMAAENT LEFT JOIN DSDATA.IMAAL_T C ON A.SFBA006 = C.IMAAl001 AND SFBAENT = IMAALENT WHERE A.SFBAENT = #{erpCode} AND A.SFBASITE = 'AM01' AND IMAAL002 = 'zh_CN' AND sfbadocno = #{workorderNo}
